directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.  Stir in rice, and cook for 2 minutes.  Pour in the coconut milk, chicken stock, cumin, coriander, red pepper flakes, salt, turmeric, bay leaf, raisins, and cashew halves.  Bring to a boil, then cover, and reduce heat to low.  Cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
title: Indian-Style Rice with Cashews, Raisins and Turmeric
